Aesthetics

aes_colour_contrast()
A colour aesthetic for contrast
aes_colour_darken() aes_colour_lighten() aes_fill_darken() aes_fill_lighten()

Sub-setup

weave_mode()
Set a mode
weave_geom_defaults()
Set a series of geom defaults

Set a discrete colour palette
weave_col_palette_c()
Set a continuous colour palette
weave_col_palette_o()
Set an ordinal colour palette
weave_theme()
Set a theme (without side-effects)
